Package br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.util

Class HibernateQueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.util.HibernateQueryBuilder
public abstract class HibernateQueryBuilder extends Object
Class responsible to build persistence hibernate queries.

  • Method Details

    • buildExpression

      public static <M extends BaseModel> String buildExpression(M model, Filter filter, Map<String,Object> whereClauseParameters) throws InternalErrorException
      Builds a query expression based on a data model.
      Type Parameters:
      M - Class that defines the data model.
      Parameters:
      model - Instance that contains the data model.
      filter - Instance that contains the search criteria.
      whereClauseParameters - Map that contains the search criteria.
      Returns:
      String that contains the query expression.
      Throws:
      InternalErrorException - Occurs when was not possible to build the query.

    • buildExpression

      public static <M extends BaseModel> void buildExpression(M model, Filter filter, String propertyPrefix, String propertyAlias, StringBuilder fieldsClause, StringBuilder fromClause, StringBuilder joinClause, StringBuilder whereClause, StringBuilder groupByClause, StringBuilder orderByClause, Map<String,Object> whereClauseParameters, Collection<String> processedRelations, boolean considerConditions, boolean relationIsComponent, boolean relationHasModel) throws InternalErrorException
      Builds a query expression based on a data model.
      Type Parameters:
      M - Class that defines the data model.
      Parameters:
      model - Instance that contains the data model.
      filter - Instance that contains the search criteria.
      propertyPrefix - String that contains the properties' prefixes.
      propertyAlias - String that contains the properties alias.
      fieldsClause - String that contains the return properties.
      fromClause - String that contains the FROM clause.
      joinClause - String that contains the JOIN clause.
      whereClause - String that contains the WHERE clause.
      groupByClause - String that contains the GROUP BY clause.
      orderByClause - String that contains the ORDER BY clause.
      whereClauseParameters - Map that contains the search criteria.
      processedRelations - List that contains the relationships already processed.
      considerConditions - Indicates if the search criteria is considered.
      relationIsComponent - Indicates if the relation is a data component.
      relationHasModel - Indicates if the relation has data models.
      Throws:
      InternalErrorException - Occurs when was not possible to build the query.

    • build

      public static org.hibernate.query.Query build(QueryType queryType, HibernatePersistence<? extends BaseModel> persistence) throws InternalErrorException
      Builds a query based on the persistence.
      Parameters:
      queryType - Instance that contains the query type.
      persistence - Instance that contains the persistence.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the query.
      Throws:
      InternalErrorException - Occurs when was not possible to build the query.

    • build

      public static <M extends BaseModel> org.hibernate.query.Query build(QueryType queryType, M model, HibernatePersistence<M> persistence) throws InternalErrorException
      Builds a query based on a data model.
      Type Parameters:
      M - Class that defines the data model.
      Parameters:
      queryType - Instance that contains the query type.
      model - Instance that contains the data model.
      persistence - Instance that contains the persistence.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the query.
      Throws:
      InternalErrorException - Occurs when was not possible to build the query.

      Type Parameters:

      Parameters:
      queryType - Instance that contains the query type.
      model - Instance that contains the data model.
      filter - Instance that contains the search criteria.
      persistence - Instance that contains the persistence.
      Returns:
